dishes.name: Chianti Classico
dishes.fullDescription: A classic Chianti from the heart of Tuscany, aged in oak barrels for 18 months. Notes of cherry, plum, and subtle spices with a smooth finish.

dishes.name: Italian Soda
dishes.shortDescription: Refreshing sparkling water with fruit syrup
dishes.fullDescription: House-made sparkling water with your choice of blood orange, lemon, or pomegranate syrup. Served with fresh citrus and ice.

dishes.name: Espresso
dishes.fullDescription: Authentic Italian espresso made from freshly ground Arabica beans. Rich, bold flavor with a perfect crema on top.

dishes.name: Bruschetta al Pomodoro
dishes.shortDescription: Toasted bread with fresh tomatoes and basil
dishes.fullDescription: Crispy sourdough bread topped with ripe Roma tomatoes, fresh basil, garlic, and extra virgin olive oil. Finished with aged balsamic glaze.

dishes.name: Antipasto Classico
dishes.fullDescription: A selection of cured meats including prosciutto and salami, fresh mozzarella, marinated olives, roasted peppers, and artichoke hearts.

dishes.name: Caprese Salad
dishes.shortDescription: Fresh mozzarella with tomatoes and basil
dishes.fullDescription: Buffalo mozzarella, vine-ripened tomatoes, and fresh basil leaves drizzled with extra virgin olive oil and aged balsamic reduction.

dishes.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
dishes.shortDescription: Classic Roman pasta with eggs and pancetta
dishes.fullDescription: Traditional spaghetti tossed with crispy pancetta, farm-fresh eggs, Pecorino Romano cheese, and freshly cracked black pepper.

dishes.name: Margherita Pizza
dishes.shortDescription: Traditional pizza with tomato, mozzarella, and basil
dishes.fullDescription: Wood-fired pizza with San Marzano tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella di bufala, fresh basil, and extra virgin olive oil on our signature sourdough crust.

dishes.name: Osso Buco
dishes.shortDescription: Braised veal shanks in wine sauce
dishes.fullDescription: Tender veal shanks slow-braised in white wine with carrots, celery, onions, and herbs. Served with saffron risotto and gremolata.

dishes.name: Seafood Risotto
dishes.fullDescription: Arborio rice slowly cooked with fresh shrimp, mussels, calamari, and scallops in a saffron-infused seafood broth with white wine.

dishes.name: Tiramisu
dishes.fullDescription: Ladyfingers soaked in espresso and coffee liqueur, layered with mascarpone cheese mixture, and dusted with cocoa powder.

dishes.name: Gelato Trio
dishes.fullDescription: Choose three flavors from our daily selection: vanilla bean, chocolate hazelnut, pistachio, strawberry, or lemon basil.

dishes.name: Cannoli Siciliani
dishes.shortDescription: Traditional Sicilian pastry with ricotta filling
dishes.fullDescription: Crispy pastry shells filled with sweet ricotta cheese mixed with candied fruits and chocolate chips, dusted with powdered sugar.
